Description: This guitar is in extraordinary condition. Basically new condition. Looks absolutely stunning!!! Shipping is free if Buy It Now is selected, otherwise it will be $55.00. Classy Visuals, Awesome Tone If you're in the market for a solidbody electric guitar with classy visuals and awesome tone, Sweetwater's got your axe. A member of Ibanez's AR Expressionist Series, the AR720FM has a feel and playability that will appeal to a wide range of players in every genre. The versatile tone of this instrument, combined with quality tonewoods and construction, add up to a value-packed guitar. The comfortable, symmetrical double-cut mahogany body is topped with stunning flame maple, while two Tri-sound-equipped Super 80 "Flying Finger" humbuckers give the Ibanez AR720FM boatloads of tonal dexterity. Ibanez AR720FM Solidbody Electric Guitar at a Glance: · Rich, vintage tone from mahogany and flame maple · Sonic flexibility from Tri-sound electronics · Three-piece neck is ultra-rigid for exceptional performance Rich, vintage tone from mahogany and flame maple The arched flame maple top on the AR720FM looks beautiful, and with the gold hardware it exudes a classy vibe. But it also enhances the rich tonality and sustain of the mahogany body, for powerful tone that can sound warm and soulful, or aggressive and biting, when you match it up with the appropriate amplifier. From mellow blues to scorching fusion, the AR720FM can do it all. Sonic flexibility from Tri-sound electronics Each of the Super 80 "Flying Finger" humbuckers on the AR720FM has a Tri-sound switch, which lets you choose between series, parallel, and split-coil operation. There's a lot of tonal territory to cover here, and you'll love exploring how each configuration sounds through your favorite amplifier. Three-piece neck is ultra-rigid for exceptional performance Multi-ply necks are ultra-rigid, which means they help transmit string energy to your guitar's body faster and better. So the three-piece AR Expressionist maple neck on the AR720FM adds clarity and detail to your performance, which balances nicely with the richness and depth of mahogany and maple body. Ibanez AR720FM Solidbody Electric Guitar Features: · Tonally-versatile guitar with mahogany body and figured maple top · Dual Super 80 "Flying Finger" humbucking pickups have a smooth, wide-ranging output · Tri-sound electronics for each pickup give you series, parallel, and split-coil wiring options · Gibraltar bridge and Quik Change Ultra tailpiece deliver exceptional sustain and tuning stability · AR Expressionist set neck plays fast and smooth, thanks to slim profile and smooth heel · Buttery bound ebony fingerboard with 22 medium frets · Gold hardware and pearl/abalone block inlays exude class · Hardshell case included Great looks and unlimited tones abound from the Ibanez AR720FM!Tech Specs Body Type Artist Left-/Right-handed Right-handed Number of Strings 6 Body Material Mahogany Top Material Flamed Maple Body Finish Urethane Color Vintage Burst Neck Material 3-pc maple, set-in Neck Shape Slim Scale Length 24.75" Fingerboard Material Ebony Fingerboard Inlay Pearl/abalone block inlays Number of Frets 22, medium Nut Width 1.693" Bridge/Tailpiece Gibraltar bridge; Quik Change Ultra tailpiece Tuners Gold tuners Number of Pickups 2 Neck Pickup Super 80 "Flying Finger" humbucking Middle Pickup No middle pickup Bridge Pickup Super 80 "Flying Finger" humbucking Controls 2 x volume, 2 x tone, 2 x Tri-sound switch, 3-way pickup selector Case Included Hardshell Manufacturer Part Number AR720FMVB
Title: Ibanez AR720FM VB with OHSC
